Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>The hot water here at the Goron Hot
Springs is real nice and all...

<sp:3:0:2:0500>But talking about <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>
makes me want to go there again.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sure, sure. There are other hot springs
boiling away in other places, but the hot
water here is the best.
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Though it used to be <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>
had the best water...before the entrance
collapsed and ya couldn't get in.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Coming to the hot spring at this hour, 
when the sun is beating down...

Ya got to be some kind of hot-spring
connoisseur to do that,<sp:5:1:0> traveler.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Simmerstone Springs is in the <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>
of <clr:0000>Gorko Tunnel<clr:ffff>, which is southeast of
these springs here.
They're top secret, ya see.<sp:5:0:0> Ya gotta be
a Goron in the know to know about 'em. 

The water at those springs is the perfect
temperature and goes real nice with all
the steam in the caves.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But the entrance got blocked off so...


I can't ask YunoboCo to fix it, and I can't
clear it out myself.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>But this spring here is my favorite right
now, so I guess I don't need any others.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ya don't often see a Hylian turn up at the
Goron Hot Springs at this hour.

Ya must be quite the hot-spring
connoisseur or somethin',<sp:5:1:0> traveler.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Well, no matter where it's located,
a hot spring is a hot spring. It all feels
the same.
This one here is pretty nice though. After
all, you can look at the Death Mountain
scenery while ya soak.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ya don't often see a Hylian turn up at the
Goron Hot Springs.

I'd wager you're some kind of hot-spring
connoisseur or somethin',<sp:5:1:0> traveler.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Got yourself to Goron Hot Springs at this
early hour, did ya?<sp:5:1:0> Why, you're a real
hot-water buff, aren't ya?
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Well, no matter how big a fan ya are,
no one—and I mean no one—beats me
into the hot springs.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You made it to the hot springs at this
hour? With the sun blazin' down like that?

I guess ya really are a hot-water buff after
all,<sp:5:1:0> traveler.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Hey now... Where's your manners?


Some of us are enjoying the water the
way it is.<sp:5:1:0> If it's too hot, you'd better go
somewhere else.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>A traveler coming to Goron Hot Springs
at this hour?<sp:5:1:0> You must be some kinda
hot-spring connoisseur or something.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Ah, but I promise ya this—I'll always be
the first one in the water!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hylians don't turn up at Goron Hot
Springs at this late hour very often.

Well, traveler,<sp:5:1:0> I suppose you're a real
hot-springs buff after all.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ya just don't see Hylians show up at
Goron Hot Springs like this.

But you, traveler... <sp:5:1:0>You're quite the
hot-springs buff, aren't ya?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>This hot spring does happen to be a good 
one. After all, you can take a soak while
gazing at the Death Mountain scenery.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Up until a little while ago, red smoke and
big ol' clumps of red rocks were flying
right out of it.
I was worried it might erupt again.<sp:5:0:0> But it
seems to have calmed down now.

Talk about a relief.
